sources.title: Hairless Hector (1941)
sources.description: A homeless sheep dog changes places with a tiny Park avenue purebred, and the butler and pet parrot try to electric-razor him into looking like the standard French Poodle. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hairless-hector-1941/

metadata.Plot: A homeless sheep dog changes places with a tiny Park avenue purebred, and the butler and pet parrot try to electric-razor him into looking like the standard French Poodle.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
